Articles.Content:
When playing in career mode, I've had many missions where I fly an unmanned probe into the SOI of another body. I'd then right click on the experiments to do the science and transmit it back to the KSC, repeating until the yield drops to about 1 science point.

I'd then get into a low orbit and repeat.

I'd then start a descent, and repeat.

This is quite tedious.

Is there a mod or other method to get a science experiment to automatically study, send and repeat until the yield diminishes to 1?

Thanks,
idk, but setting up all your experiments in an action group helps a bit
As kurja said, go into your action groups in the Vehicle Assembly and set all of your science things to 1 or something. Then all you need to do is press your key and press transmit a few times.
